column5: I got a rebate from my Canada trip this summer. It was a Canadian check. My thought is that the amount is in Canadian currency and not US currency?
Its a Canadian government check and in Canadian funds. Your bank will cash it and give you the exchange rate, and maybe a service charge for a foreign check. I,m just happy to get something back.
If you're going back next year check with your outfitter about endorsing the check over to them. You'll still lose the exchange rate but won't pay the service fee.
lots of previous discussion on this item - see for example:https://www.walleyecentral.com/forums...&highlight=HST
